overview:
Easy-to-use connectivity and communications technologies will [continue to] change people’s lives and how they interact with other people and the things that are important to them … and sometimes in ways we can not yet understand.

My personal mission is to help discover a few of these!

Exceptional and progressive achievements in strategic planning, change leadership, marketing, market development, and product management.

Broad industry exposure including cloud services, information technology, communications, security, instrumentation, consumer electronics, and public sectors.

Comprehensive strategic channel development experience includes B2B, B2C, direct, VAR, retail, two-tier distribution, and web.

Extensive global experience includes North America, Europe, and Asia.

Specialties Strategy Development, Change Leadership, Organizational Development, Product Positioning, Go-to-Market Implementation

degrees.subject: Energy Resource Management, Marketing
degrees.institution: Daniels Business School, University of Denver
